name: Wp-ivoox Shortcode
tagline: WordPress plugin for embedding an invoox.com audio
body: # WP ivoox Plugin to insert an audio from [ivoox.com](http://ivoox.com) It's a simple plugin to embed the ivoox.com player in a post or page of a WordPress Blog The shortcode looks like this: [ivoox]http://www.ivoox.com/lgds-la-guarida-del-sith-3x16-thor-steven-audios-mp3_rf_2582787_1.html[/ivoox] The URL must be the audio URL from the browser address bar. ## You can donate :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
